item.title: Welcome to my corner of internet
item.description:
Hi! I am Shivam Yadav, a sophomore in Instrumentation and Control Engineering at Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology(2015-2019) who found his passion in everything Computer Science and Mathematics and I like building things.

You can contact me at shivamyadav850580[at]gmail[dot]com
